data.comment: The match is underway in Volgograd.
In Volgograd, Aleksandr Sobolev of Spartak Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 2, Zelimkhan Bakaev for the away team is judged to be offside.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Zelimkhan Bakaev (Spartak Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ayrton Lucas of Spartak Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 9, Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Important block from the Volgograd defence as Georgi Dzhikiya fires in a strike for Spartak Moscow.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 11, Spartak Moscow are pushing forward but Samuel Gigot's finish is wide of the goal.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Volgograd.
In the minute 14, Spartak Moscow push forward at Zenit Stadium and Zelimkhan Bakaev gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Volgograd defence.
Volgograd are coming forward and Kamil Mullin gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 16, In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Sergey Serchenkov of Volgograd gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Zenit Stadium.
Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Volgograd's half?
Spartak Moscow's Roman Zobnin gets in a shot on goal at Zenit Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
In the minute 25, Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 28, Sergey Makarov (Volgograd) gets a yellow card.
Aleksandr Sobolev (Spartak Moscow) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
Spartak Moscow's Aleksandr Sobolev breaks free at Zenit Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 32, Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Spartak Moscow in Volgograd.
Volgograd needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 34, Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Spartak Moscow.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Volgograd.
In the minute 36, Spartak Moscow's Alex Kral misses with an attempt on goal.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Zelimkhan Bakaev for Spartak Moscow drives towards goal at Zenit Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Volgograd's Oleg Aleynik gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Spartak Moscow defender.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 40, Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
In Volgograd Volgograd drive forward through Danil Stepanov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Volgograd drives forward and Sergey Serchenkov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Zenit Stadium.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Volgograd.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
In the minute 51, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a throw-in for Spartak Moscow, close to Volgograd's area.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
Spartak Moscow's Roman Zobnin has run offside.
In the minute 52, An attacking Spartak Moscow player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Volgograd's Saba Kverkvelia has been booked in Volgograd.
Goal! Zelimkhan Bakaev gives Spartak Moscow a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Zenit Stadium.
In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Volgograd.
In the minute 58, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Spartak Moscow in Volgograd.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Volgograd to check on Georgi Dzhikiya, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 61, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the home team a throw-in.
Aleksandr Khatskevich is making the team's first substitution at Zenit Stadium with Ilya Zhigulev replacing Sergey Serchenkov.
Georgi Dzhikiya for Spartak Moscow is back on the field again.
Spartak Moscow are pushing forward but Zelimkhan Bakaev's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 63, Volgograd have a goal kick.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Volgograd.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
Free kick Volgograd.
In the minute 65, Roman Zobnin (Spartak Moscow) has received a yellow card from Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Azat Bairyyev (Volgograd) has received a first yellow card.
Sergey Makarov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Volgograd.
Volgograd's Oleg Aleynik is whistled for offside at Zenit Stadium.
In the minute 68, Spartak Moscow are coming forward and Jordan Larsson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi waits before resuming play because Armen Manucharyan for Volgograd is still down.
In the minute 70, Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Volgograd.
Cedric Gogoua is booked for the home team.
Spartak Moscow's Zelimkhan Bakaev gets in a shot on goal at Zenit Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Volgograd have a goal kick.
Volgograd are whistled for offside.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 74, Volgograd pushes forward through Zurab Davitashvili, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In Volgograd, Kamil Mullin (Volgograd) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 76, Armen Manucharyan has recovered and rejoins the match in Volgograd.
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Zelimkhan Bakaev with Maksim Glushenkov. This is the first substitution made today by Domenico Tedesco.
In the minute 78, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
Aleksandr Khatskevich (Volgograd) is making a second change, with Mukhammad Sultonov replacing the possibly injured Armen Manucharyan.
Evgeniy Pesegov is on a sub for Oleg Aleynik for Volgograd.
In the minute 80, Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 81, Volgograd have a dangerous throw-in.
Volgograd's Zurab Davitashvili is on target but unsuccessful.
Aleksandr Khatskevich (Volgograd) is making a fourth substitution, with Oleg Kozhemyakin replacing Sergey Makarov.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 82, Andrey Eshchenko is replacing Jordan Larsson for Spartak Moscow at Zenit Stadium.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
In Volgograd Spartak Moscow drive forward through Maksim Glushenkov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 84, Maksim Glushenkov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spartak Moscow.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Volgograd throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 85, Volgograd's Ilya Zhigulev misses with an attempt on goal.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Attention is being given to Spartak Moscow’s Roman Zobnin and play has been suspended briefly.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
In the minute 88, Roman Zobnin is back on his feet again.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Volgograd's Zurab Davitashvili gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
Spartak Moscow will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Volgograd.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
The away team have replaced Nail Umyarov with Guus Til. This is the third substitution made today by Domenico Tedesco.
Andrey Eshchenko (Spartak Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Aleksandr Sobolev (Spartak Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Oleg Kozhemyakin (Volgograd) has received a first yellow card.
At Zenit Stadium, Aleksandr Maksimenko has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Pavel Maslov is booked for the away team.
